name: RememberWE (RemeberME season2, Very Simple GAME!!!!)
description:
By simple game, let's check my brain!

'RememberWE' where can enjoy all the men and women is a very simple game.

Touch the 'GO'button and then touch the circle in the order occurring.

As you quickly touch of a button, you can get some more points.

level 50 is the last time.

If you record level 40, Get ready to join Mensa club. :)
